testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.quote: TechFlow has completely transformed how we operate. We've saved 20 hours per week on manual tasks and our team can focus on what really matters.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.quote: The ROI was immediate. Within the first month, we automated our entire onboarding process and reduced errors by 95%. Absolutely game-changing.

testimonials.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.quote: Best automation platform we've used. The AI capabilities are truly impressive and the support team is exceptional. Highly recommend!

faqs.question: How long does it take to set up?
faqs.answer: Most customers are up and running within 15 minutes. Our intuitive interface guides you through the setup process, and our templates help you get started instantly.

faqs.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
faqs.answer: Not at all! Our platform is designed for everyone. The visual workflow builder requires zero coding. However, developers can use our API for advanced customizations.

faqs.question: Can I cancel anytime?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. There are no long-term contracts or commitments. You can cancel your subscription at any time with just one click.

faqs.question: What integrations do you support?
faqs.answer: We integrate with 50+ popular tools including Slack, Google Workspace, Salesforce, HubSpot, Stripe, and many more. We add new integrations every month based on customer requests.

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: Security is our top priority. We use bank-level AES-256 encryption, are SOC 2 Type II certified, and fully compliant with GDPR and HIPAA. Your data is encrypted both in transit and at rest.

faqs.question: Do you offer a free trial?
faqs.answer: Yes! All plans come with a free trial period - no credit card required. You can explore all features and cancel anytime during the trial if it's not the right fit.
